CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page 16, reads: "...6. Mrs. Margaret French is the lovely hostess in the Pet Milk Company's booth.  Shown with her are Charles Perz and Wib Creelman, district managers..."
TitMainTitle: Charles Perz, Margaret French, and Wib Creelman, standing in Pet Milk booth in Syria Mosque for the 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
